results.title: My life with my family
results.creator_credit: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life, so far, has been quite a struggle for Negabanchi Tebeje and her family. With her dad fighting for democracy, the Tebeje family have moved from Ethiopia to Sudan and, finally, Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Negabanchi Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Building
results.creator_credit: Dale Smith, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dale Smith dedicates her story to her dad, a man of infinite creativity and resourcefulness. His inventiveness extended to building houses, caravans, mobile homes, trailers and, above all, a family who adore him.

results.title: Triptych
results.creator_credit: Walter Bird, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Walter Bird recalls a time when he was asked “Where are you from?”, and answered by describing where his house was situated in the neighbourhood. Growing up, he started to learn the implications of that question. He realised that he was ethnically different from other Australian-born children. Being the child of immigrants, Walter weighs up the positives and negatives of being a first generation Australian and shares his experiences when he finally travelled to his parents’ countries.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walter Bird, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Walter Bird recalls a time when he was asked “Where are you from?”, and answered by describing where his house was situated in the neighbourhood. Being the child of immigrants, Walter weighs up the positives and negatives of being a first generation Australian and shares his experiences when he finally travelled to his parents’ countries.

results.title: Glory and fame
results.creator_credit: Ayesha Lai, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ayesha Lai came from a big family from many different cultures. But one thing her family shared is their love for Australian Rules football. Ayesha tells of how she developed her passion for the game, through her brothers and reading about the great Indigenous footballers who played for Essendon. Eventually she threw her support behind the club, which culminated in meeting and talking with Kevin Sheedy.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ayesha Lai, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Ayesha Lai came from a big family from many different cultures. But one thing her family shared is their love for Australian Rules football. Ayesha tells of how she developed her passion for the game, through her brothers and reading about the great Indigenous footballers who played for Essendon. Eventually she threw her support behind the club, which culminated in meeting and talking with Kevin Sheedy.

results.title: The Invisible net
results.creator_credit: Sarah Vincent, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sarah Vincent looks at 2008, a year of immense ups and downs, and, in particular, when she was diagnosed with cancer. Rather than dwelling on the treatment and anxiety, Sarah chooses to focus on the amazing support she received from her community of family, friends, the school and neighbours. Through their support, Sarah learned to count her blessings and credits cancer with changing her outlook on life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Vincent, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

Through their support, Sarah learned to count her blessings and credits cancer with changing her outlook on life.

results.title: My special family
results.creator_credit: Erin Wilson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Erin Wilson pays tribute to her special family, a family who have taught her all about life. From her family, Erin has learnt responsibility, empathy, the realities of life and death and, most importantly, love and friendship. Here she pays tribute to the members of this special family.

results.title: Prayer for fame
results.creator_credit: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Angela Josifoska, a teenager living in Melbourne’s western suburbs, tells of her quest for fame. She shares her early youth and the things that interested her throughout her life, culminating in a passion for performance. She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Angela Josifoska, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

She candidly shares her dreams and ambitions for the future and her determination to succeed shines through.
